=======================
"52h04" Sky Environment
=======================

by [HAU]TOT -- http://www.kk3d.de



Exclusively designed for the 2nd cs.de 52h mapping contest.



For optimized results please set the light_environment values in Hammer editor as follows:

Pitch Yaw Roll (Y Z X) : 0 328 0
                 Pitch : -19
            Brightness : 254 253 227 XXX (the XXX / brightness value depends from your map)
